title: Modern Scandinavian Studio Retreat in Kamienny Potok
description: This minimalist Scandinavian studio offers seamless open-plan living in an uncluttered and thoughtfully designed layout. Large windows invite natural light into the 30 sqm space, while integrated storage allows efficient use of every corner. A modern kitchenette pairs custom cabinetry with up-to-date appliances, complementing the airy, peaceful atmosphere. The en suite bathroom features contemporary finishes and a walk-in shower, creating a truly functional and elegant home.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Sopot's Kamienny Potok, you’ll enjoy the charm of a cultural and family-friendly district with easy access to vibrant local restaurants, parks, and neighborhood amenities. Stroll or bike along lush, well-maintained pathways, or reach city attractions quickly via public transport links. The peaceful neighborhood ambiance strikes a comfortable balance between lively surroundings and quiet residential living.
lifestyle_benefits: secure access for peace of mind
enjoyable rooftop relaxation with sea breezes
target_buyer: Ideal for retirees seeking effortless living in a tranquil setting, close to amenities and community activities, with excellent building facilities and minimal upkeep.
market_positioning: A rare find within Sopot’s cultural enclave—modern, secure, and efficient living tailored for those who value peace, convenience, and both community and privacy.
